articles.title: What turned Tata Nexon Into India's largest selling SUV beating Hyundai Creta - ETAuto
articles.description: With sales of 14,248 units in fiscal 2022, the electric version of the compact SUV has helped Tata Nexon usurp the pole position in the SUV category in the country. Only 6,000 units separated Nexon from Hyundai Creta and the share of the EV, which now account…
articles.content:

articles.title: Buy This Tata Group Stock For 175% Dividend & Good Upside Potential - Goodreturns
articles.description: For FY-22, the Board of Tata Power Company Ltd (TPCL) has recommended a dividend of Rs 1.75 per share of Rs 1 each i.e. 175 per cent to shareholders for the year ended March 31, 2022. This is subject to shareholder approval at the Companys upcoming 103rd Annu…
